| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire"), [cold](/wiki/Cold "Cold"), [shock](/wiki/Shock "Shock"), [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison")                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                     |
| Sir Garland:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* waits for you to come.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame. |                                                                                                                     |
html:
Sir Garland

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Sir Garland
Difficulty 8
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical
@ Sir Garland
Difficulty 8
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical

Base level 6
Base experience 81
Speed 16
Base AC 10
Base MR 6
Alignment -3 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances fire, cold, shock, poison
Resistances conveyed poison

Sir Garland:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • waits for you to come.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • may turn against you when tame.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Sir_Garland&oldid=131213"
